section1.headline: What is your perspective
section1.intro:
My solutions may be just a drop in the ocean, but it is my desire to make life just a little bit better, for as many people as possible that motivates me.
It’s all about legacy…

section2.headline: Bedrock
section2.intro:
The supporting foundations from which everything grows.
I have spent many years in education and industry cultivating a rich creative and technical skillset that allows me to both conceive and then create my ideas.

section3.headline: Digital
section3.intro:
In the beginning, there was digital.
As I pursued higher education in the slipstream of the dot com boom, working in digital was always inevitable and I am as much absorbed in it today as I was then.

section4.headline: Analog
section4.intro:
Going back to the beginning.
With digital comes motionless, so analog is my balance, providing harmony and connection with the world outside of digital… the natural world.

section5.headline: Thereafter
section5.intro:
Would you like to be in the next scene of my journey?
Send me a message telling me what we can create together that will make a difference.
